characterSummary:
Ahsoka Tano was a former Jedi Padawan who, after 
the Clone Wars, helped establish a network of various 
rebel cells against the Galactic Empire. Jedi Grand Master 
Yoda assigned the young Tano to be the Padawan 
learner of  Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker.

Carasynthia "Cara" Dune was a human female Alderaanian 
who served as a shock trooper in the Alliance to Restore 
the Republic and the New Republic during the Galactic 
Civil War.

Greef Karga was a human male and former disgraced 
magistrate before becoming an agent of the Bounty Hunters' 
Guild following the collapse of the Galactic Empire.

Grogu, known to many simply as "the Child", was 
a male Force-sensitive Mandalorian foundling that belonged 
to the same species as Jedi Grand Master Yoda.

IG-11, also known as Eyegee-Eleven or simply as IG or 
Eyegee, was a masculine-programmed IG-series 
assassin droid who was a bounty hunter during 
the New Republic Era.

Kuiil was an Ugnaught male who had worked a lifetime 
to be free of servitude. He came to the out-of-the-way 
planet of Arvala-7 seeking peace, and worked as a 
vapor farmer who offered valuable skills to those who 
could meet his price.

Din Djarin was a human male Mandalorian who worked 
as a bounty hunter during the New Republic Era. 
Djarin, found and took care of former Jedi youngling named 
Grogu, that belonged to the same species as Jedi Grand 
Master Yoda.

Imperial Moff Gideon is fiercely determined to capture 
the Child, known as Grogu. Clever and formidable, Gideon 
values power and knowledge. He wields the ancient 
Darksaber, an artifact of great import to Mandalorians.

Arya Stark is the third child and second daughter 
of Lord Eddard Stark and his wife, Lady Catelyn Stark. 
Arya plays a significant role in the Great War, effectively 
ending the conflict through her killing of the Night King 
during the Battle of Winterfell.

Queen Cersei I Lannister was the twentieth ruler 
of the Seven Kingdoms and the widow of King Robert 
Baratheon. After all her children died, Cersei assumed 
the Iron Throne making her the first officially recognized 
queen regnant in the history of the Seven Kingdoms.

Queen Daenerys I Targaryen, also known as Daenerys 
Stormborn, and colloquially known as Dany, 
was the younger sister of Rhaegar Targaryen. As the 
story unfolds she gathered confidence and 
followers, becoming a formidable conquerer and ruler.

Ser Jaime Lannister was the elder son of Lord 
Tywin Lannister, younger twin brother of Queen 
Cersei Lannister. During Robert's Rebellion, Jaime killed 
Aerys Targaryen, earning the nickname "Kingslayer". 
He was pardoned by Robert and served in his Kingsguard.

Jon Snow, born Aegon Targaryen, is the son of 
Lyanna Stark and Rhaegar Targaryen. From infancy, 
Jon is presented as the bastard son of Lord Eddard 
Stark. Jon joins the Night's Watch and is later 
elected as Lord Commander.

Samwell, born Samwell Tarly, and often called 
Sam, is Jon Snow's closest friend. After investigating, 
Sam realizes that Robert's Rebellion was built 
on a lie and that Jon (whose birth name was Aegon 
Targaryen), is the true heir to the Iron Throne.

Queen Sansa Stark is the eldest daughter of 
Lord Eddard Stark and Lady Catelyn. Following the 
Battle of King's Landing and Daenerys's assassination, 
Sansa declares the North an independent kingdom 
and is later crowned Queen in the North.

Lord Tyrion Lannister is the youngest child of Lord 
Tywin Lannister and younger brother of Cersei 
and Jaime Lannister. Tyrion eventually becomes 
hand of the Queen to Daenerys Targeryen and helps 
lead the war against his sister Cersei Lannister.
